title: Gamification-Based Intangible Cultural Heritage Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and general understanding of cultural heritage
context.additional_context: Conducted in small-scale collaborative environments using digital devices, exploring scientific preservation methods for regional intangible cultural heritage

learning_goals: Learners can explain oral folktales associated with traditional textile patterns using game elements with over 85% accuracy
Learners can apply three scientific preservation techniques for intangible cultural heritage through digital archive design
Learners can improve community cultural heritage awareness by 40% compared to baseline using team-developed gamification content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
